db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates how to inject CSS into web pages using user scripts.

db:article.db:para: StyleSheet Browser demonstrates how to use the Qt WebEngine C++ classes to inject user stylesheets into web pages.

db:section.db:title: Running the Example
db:section.db:para: To run the example from Qt Creator, open the Welcome mode and select the example from Examples. For more information, visit Building and Running an Example.

db:section.db:title: Working With Stylesheets
db:section.db:para: We use JavaScript to create and append CSS elements to the documents. After declaring the script source, QWebEnginePage::runJavaScript() can run it immediately and apply newly created styles on the current content of the web view. Encapsulating the script into a QWebEngineScript and adding it to the script collection of QWebEnginePage makes its effect permanent.
